<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

---

Lethargy poison is commonly used in hit-and-run tactics by attackers who want their victims alive; the ambusher retreats until the poison sets in and the victim falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95). Further exposure to lethargy poison doesn't require the target to attempt additional saving throws; only failing a saving throw against an ongoing exposure can progress its stage. 

**Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 4 hours; **Stage 1** [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** slowed 1 (1 minute); **Stage 3** unconscious with no Perception check to wake up (1 round) **Stage 4** unconscious with no Perception check to wake up (1d4 hours)
